features.description: Our sophisticated AI delivers exceptional clarity and sharpness without complexity.

items.title: Instant Results
items.description: Achieve remarkable deblurring in seconds with our streamlined AI technology. No lengthy processing times.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three straightforward steps to restore your photos

items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Drag and drop or browse to upload your image. Supported formats include JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: AI Enhancement
items.description: Our cutting-edge AI analyzes and removes blur, restoring sharpness while maintaining quality.

items.title: Download Your Clear Image
items.description: Preview the enhanced image with our slider and download it in high resolution.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless satisfied users who have restored their photos with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Emily Roberts
items.comment: The deblurring feature worked wonders on my family photos. Details I thought were lost forever were brought back!

items.name: Daniel Lee

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your inquiries about AI Image Deblurring

items.title: What types of blur can be fixed?
items.description: Our AI can effectively address motion blur, focus blur, and Gaussian blur, restoring clarity to a wide range of images.

items.title: Is there a cost associated with the service?
items.description: Yes! We provide 30 free credits daily for users. You can gain more credits through our community challenges, and we offer subscription plans for users with higher demands.

items.title: Can the restored images be used commercially?
items.description: Commercial use is available for users on a paid plan. Free-tier users may only use the images for personal projects.

items.title: How do you ensure my images are secure?
items.description: All processing occurs in your browser, so your images never leave your device, ensuring maximum privacy.

footer.heading: Ready to Restore Your Photos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI today and see the transformation for yourself. No sign-up needed.
